ud4.9:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
ud4.9:1.3: Then as Venerable Upasena Vaṅgantaputta was in private retreat this thought came to his mind:
ud4.9:1.4: “I’m so fortunate, so very fortunate! My Teacher is the Blessed One, perfected, a fully awakened Buddha.
ud4.9:1.5: Well explained is the teaching and training in which I have gone forth from the lay life to homelessness.
ud4.9:1.6: My spiritual companions are ethical and of good character.
